mapper.select: select u.*, coalesce(string_agg(distinct r.role_name,','),'') as role_names from users u left join user_departments ud on u.id = ud.user_id left join user_roles ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join roles r on ur.role_id = r.id where ud.department_id = #{deptId} group by u.id
select * from departments d left join user_departments ud on d.id = ud.department_id left join users u on ud.user_id = u.id where u.account = #{username}
